member.name: OLECMDTEXTF
member.summary: Specifies the type of information that an object should store in the structure passed in . One value from this enumeration is stored the cmdtextf member of the OLECMDTEXT structure to indicate the desired information.

member.name: OLECMDTEXTF.OLECMDTEXTF_NAME
member.summary: The object should provide the localized name of the command.

member.name: OLECMDTEXTF.OLECMDTEXTF_STATUS
member.summary: The object should provide a localized status string for the command.
